attributes.action: give an amnesty to all ILLegal immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: that lived in the UK for 5 years or more. so that gives this people the chance to settle and work lawfully. and pay taxes and integrate to the community.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "give an amnesty to all ILLegal immigrants."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11172.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Amnesty/
